name: Fortune JP Palace Mysore
description: Located in Mysore, the elegant Fortune JP Palace features sweeping views of Chamundi Hills. It presents a swimming pool, 3 dining options and spacious rooms with a flat-screen TV.

name: Radisson Blu Plaza Hotel Mysore
description: Offering an outdoor swimming pool, Radisson Blu Plaza Hotel Mysore is located in Mysore. It is 2 km from the Mysore Palace. Free WiFi access is available.

name: Xcel Luxury Hotel Apartments
description: Situated 2.4 km from Mysore Palace, Xcel Luxury Hotel Apartments-Home Living Redefined offers a garden, a shared lounge and air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi.
